DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3 study compare efficacy talabostat plus pemetrexed pemetrexed plus placebo patient Stage IIIB/IV NSCLC fail platinum-based chemotherapy regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Study Talabostat Pemetrexed vs. Pemetrexed Stage IIIB/IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) After Failure Platinum-Based Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Men woman age ≥18 year Histologically cytologically confirm NSCLC ( Recurrent , locally advanced metastatic , inoperable NSCLC [ Stage IIIB/IV ] . Patients Stage IIIB NSCLC must cytologically document pleural effusion . ) Failed relapsed receive platinumcontaining chemotherapy regimen firstline therapy advance NSCLC Measurable disease computerize tomography ( CT ) scan ECOG Performance Status 0 1 Expected survival ≥12 week Provide write informed consent More 2 prior chemotherapy regimens Progression disease prior pemetrexed treatment Brain metastasis ( exception : patient resection and/or complete course cranial irradiation , worsen CNS symptom , discontinue corticosteroid indication least 1 month ) Serum creatinine ≥2.0mg/dL creatinine clearance < 45mL/min Absolute neutrophil count < 1500/μL platelet < 100,000/μL Any malignancy within 5 year immediately prior first dose study medication ( exception : basal cell nonmetastatic squamous cell carcinoma skin , carcinoma insitu cervix ) Any comorbidity condition , opinion investigator , may interfere assessment procedure protocol Patients within 28 day chemotherapy , radiation therapy , immunotherapy , investigational medication NSCLC . Patients must recover side effect treatment . Pregnancy lactation . Women childbearing potential nonvasectomized men must agree use barrier method contraception treatment .
